::Greven::

Greven growled when Surgital picked him up, firing two missiles back
out of the hole as he was thrown into it, trying to hit Surgital.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok, everybody, I need you guys to help me with something,
mainly the Alliance members and Maximals at the battle with the
Decepticons at the CF.  I have too many Decepticons, so I need
Surgital to be destroyed, so that way all the Bodicons will be mangled
and that will solve some of my character number problems.
> 
> ::Surgital::
> 
>       Surgital was just about to bring his foot down hard on Cledar,
when two missiles from a little punk named Greven hit his chest. 
Surgital was only on one leg, and the missiles easily made him fall to
the ground.
> 
>        "Errr!!  Now, I crush everybody!" Surgital yelled.
> 
>        He converted his hand into a big drill, then shoved it into
the ground and made a huge pit, or, by the size of it, a crater. 
Then, he bent down to pick up Greven, and throw him in the pit.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Yanshosh@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 7:45 PM
>   Subject: Re: Out of the Fire
> 
> 
>   ::Greven::
> 
>   Greven growls. This bot was not going to ignore him. He wanted to
>   fight at this battle, not just sit there.
> 
>   Charging at Surgital, Greven fires two missiles at the Gestalt's
>   chest.
> 
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
>   > ::Surgital::
>   > 
>   >      Surgital got hit in the side of his head by two charges,
and
>   growled out in rage.  Then, he felt two missiles hit his butt.
>   > 
>   >        "OW!" Surgital yelled, jumping up a little, and rubbing
his
>   butt with his two hands. :)
>   > 
>   >         Then, the big one hit him.  The blast from the fusion
cannon
>   was a weapon that was actually a match for him.  It hit him in the
>   back, and charred his back plating, as well as left a few small
>   scratches.  The gestalt wasn't sure how much he could take.  But
>   unlike everybody else, he wouldn't seperate, yet...
>   > 
>   >           Surgital lifted up his leg, then, with all his might,
sent
>   it down to the ground, attempting to crush Cledar.
> 
>
